properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 8 at 8:13AM EST until February 10 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Tallahassee FL
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida...
Georgia...

Choctawhatchee River near Caryville (US 90) affecting Holmes and
Washington Counties
Choctawhatchee River near Bruce (SR 20) affecting Walton and
Washington Counties
Kinchafoonee Creek near 11 E Of Dawson At Pinewood Rd In Lee County
affecting Lee County
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama...
Florida...Georgia...
Chattahoochee River at Columbia L&D affecting Houston...Jackson...
Early and Seminole Counties
Muckalee Creek near Leesburg (SR 195) affecting Lee County
Flint River at Bainbridge (US 27) affecting Decatur County
Apalachicola River near Blountstown affecting Calhoun...
Franklin...Gulf and Liberty Counties

The Flood Warning continues for
the Muckalee Creek near Leesburg (SR 195).
* Until Monday morning.
* At  7:45 AM Saturday the stage was 13.4 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 13.0 feet.
* Forecast: The river will continue rising to near 13.6 feet by this
evening. The river will fall below flood stage tomorrow evening.
* Impact: At 14.0 feet: Water will cross North Hampton Road in the 700
block. Additional inundation occurs along the creek further
downstream.
properties.instruction:
All persons with interest along the river should monitor the latest
forecasts, and be prepared to take necessary precautions to protect
life and property. Do not drive cars through flooded areas. If you
see flood waters: Turn around. Don't drown.

For graphical hydrologic information, please go to weather.gov and
click on your state. Select Rivers and Lakes AHPS under current
conditions and click on your river point.
